properties.name: End
properties.expression: thisLayer.effect('Pointy Pants')('Pant Length') + 0.1 * Math.sign(thisLayer.effect('Pointy Pants')('Pant Angle'))

properties.name: Amount
properties.expression: thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Pant Back').content('Trimmed Offset Base Path').content('Offset Paths 1').amount

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: if (thisLayer.effect('Pointy Pants')('Pant Angle') > 0) {thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Pant Back').content('Opening Path').path} else {value		}

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: if (thisLayer.effect('Pointy Pants')('Pant Angle') > 0) {value	} else {thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Pant Back').content('Opening Path').path	}

properties.name: Scale
properties.expression: const mywidth = thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Pant Back').content('Trimmed Offset Base Path').content('Offset Paths 1').amount * 2;[mywidth, mywidth]

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: function limbPath() {        // Limber Path Limb        const thisProp = thisProperty;        const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');        const curveLin = endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('curvature').value[1] * 0.01;        if (curveLin === 0) {            return thisProp.createPath([                endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p0').value,                endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p1ikfkfreek').value,                endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p2ikfkfreek').value,            ], [], [], false);        }        else {            const inTangPos = endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('inTangPos').value;            const outTangPos = endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('outTangPos').value;            return thisProp.createPath([                endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p0').value,                endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p1ikfkfreek').value,                endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p2ikfkfreek').value,            ], [[0, 0], inTangPos, [0, 0]], [[0, 0], thisLayer.mul(outTangPos, -1), [0, 0]], false);        }    }limbPath();// Limber Library limbPath

properties.name: Scale
properties.expression: const mywidth = thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Leg').content('Middle Offset Path').content('Offset Paths 1').amount * 2;[mywidth, mywidth]

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: const sourcePath = thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Leg').content('Middle Offset Path').content('Path').path;const p0normal = sourcePath.normalOnPath(0.001);const p0 = sourcePath.points()[0];const w = thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Leg').content('Middle Offset Path').content('Offset Paths 1').amount + thisLayer.effect('Pointy Pants')('Pant Width') * thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const l = thisLayer.effect('Pointy Pants')('Pant Length') * 0.01;const p1normal = sourcePath.normalOnPath(l);const verts = [	sourcePath.pointOnPath(l) + p1normal * w,	sourcePath.pointOnPath(l) - p1normal * w,]const ang2 = Math.PI - thisLayer.effect('Pointy Pants')('Pant Angle') * 0.005 * Math.PI;const ang1 = Math.PI * 3 - ang2const tang1 = [	p1normal[0] * Math.cos(ang1) - p1normal[1] * Math.sin(ang1),	p1normal[0] * Math.sin(ang1) + p1normal[1] * Math.cos(ang1),]const tang2 = [	p1normal[0] * Math.cos(ang2) - p1normal[1] * Math.sin(ang2),	p1normal[0] * Math.sin(ang2) + p1normal[1] * Math.cos(ang2),]const intans = [	-tang1 * w,	tang1 * w,]const outtans = [	tang2 * w,	-tang2 * w,]thisProperty.createPath(verts, intans, outtans, true)

properties.name: Amount
properties.expression: thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Leg').content('Middle Offset Path').content('Offset Paths 1').amount + thisLayer.effect('Pointy Pants')('Pant Width') * thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];

properties.name: Scale
properties.expression: const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const scaleFactor = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('scaleFactor').value[0];const widthScale = endctrl.effect('Limber')('Width Scale') * 0.01;[scaleFactor * widthScale, 0]

properties.name: Scale
